casebody.data:
[Cite as 01/03/2003 Case Announcements, 2003-Ohio-6.]

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS AND ADMINISTRATIVE ACTIONS

January 3, 2003

RECONSIDERATION OF PRIOR DECISIONS

2002-1538. Gertz v. Nerone & Sons, Inc.

Cuyahoga App. No. 80422, 2002-Ohio-3782. Reported at 97 Ohio St.3d 1482, 2002-Ohio-6866, 780 N.E.2d 286. On motion for reconsideration. Motion denied.

Douglas, J., participated in the decision of this motion before his retirement.
